error.title: Error

meta.title: Pokémon Team Analysis
meta.description: Analyze your Pokémon team to see how they stack up against other teams.
meta.keywords: Pokémon, Analysis, Stats, Pokémon Go, VGC, Pokémon Battle, Pokémon Team, Ranked Battles

home.noTeamsDescription: Create your first Pokémon team to get started with analysis!
home.teamHasProblems: There are problems in the team

cookieConsent.title: Cookie Consent
cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site usage. By continuing to use our site, you consent to our use of cookies.

footer.copyright: Pokémon Team Analysis. All rights reserved for original content.

meta.title: Privacy and Terms
meta.description: Our privacy policy and terms of service
meta.keywords: privacy policy, terms of service, legal, data protection

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how Pokemon Team Analysis ("we" or "our") collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our service.

informationCollection.title: Information We Collect
content: Pokemon team data and configurations (stored locally in your browser)
Analysis preferences and settings (stored locally in your browser)
Language preferences (stored locally in your browser)

informationUse.title: How We Use Your Information
informationUse.content: We use the collected information to provide and improve our Pokemon team analysis service, remember your preferences, and ensure the proper functioning of our platform.

dataStorage.title: How We Store Your Data
dataStorage.content: Your team data is stored using localStorage in your browser locally. This means: Your data never leaves your device, we cannot access your personal team configurations, clearing your browser data will reset your saved teams, and your data is not shared with third parties.

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.content: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal information with third parties for their marketing purposes. Your Pokemon team data remains private and is stored locally on your device. We may share anonymized, aggregated data for research purposes to improve Pokemon battle analysis. We may disclose information if required by law or to protect our rights and safety.

cookiesAndStorage.title: Cookies and Local Storage
cookiesAndStorage.content: We use cookies to save your language preferences and browser localStorage to save your team analysis data and configurations. We do not use tracking cookies for advertising or analytics purposes.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.content: We may use third-party services for analytics and hosting. These services have their own privacy policies.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to: clear your local team data at any time, disable JavaScript to prevent data storage, and contact us regarding any privacy concerns.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at {email}.

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.introduction: By using Pokemon Team Analysis, you agree to these Terms of Service.

appContent.title: Application Content
appContent.content: Pokemon Team Analysis is a fan-made application. All rights reserved for original content. All Pokémon-related content, including names, images, and data, are the property of Nintendo, Game Freak, and Creatures Inc.

userBehavior.title: User Behavior
userBehavior.content: When using our service, you agree to: use the application for personal, non-commercial purposes only, not attempt to reverse engineer or exploit the application, not use automated tools or bots with the application, and respect the intellectual property rights of Pokémon creators.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: The application is provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. We are not responsible for any data loss or technical issues.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service indicates acceptance of any changes.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about these terms or our privacy policy, please contact us at {email}.

teamImportModal.title: Import Pokémon Team

content.1: Select the appropriate game version and rules
content.2: Paste the team data in the text area below
content.3: Click "Import Team" to add it to your collection

teamImportModal.dataInputPlaceholder:
Paste your team here...

Example:
Incineroar (M) {'@'} Safety Goggles
Ability: Intimidate
Level: 50
Shiny: Yes
Tera Type: Fairy
EVs: 244 HP / 188 Def / 76 SpD
Impish Nature
IVs: 0 Spe
 - U - turn
 - Fake Out
 - Flare Blitz
 - Knock Off

deleteTeam.title: Delete Team
deleteTeam.message: Are you sure you want to delete this team? This action cannot be undone.

notFound.title: Team Not Found
notFound.description: The team with ID "{id}" does not exist or has been deleted.

validationErrors.title: Team Validation Errors
validationErrors.description: Your team data has the following issues, please click the edit button to fix:

teamMembers.title: Team Members ({count}/6)
teamMembers.description: Below are the detailed information of Pokémon in your team

rawData.title: Raw Team Data
rawData.description: This is the original team text data you imported
rawData.copyButton: Copy raw team data to clipboard

validationError.description: Your team data has issues and cannot be analyzed for resistance. Please fix the team data first.

resistance.noEffectiveAttacks: All team members take normal damage from this type attack

typeCombination.analysisFor: Analysis results for the following type combination:

popularPokemon.description: Analyze your team's effectiveness against popular Pokémon.

meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Learn more about Pokémon Team Analysis and how to contact us
meta.keywords: about, contact, Pokémon team analysis, FAQ

about.title: About Us
about.description: Frequently asked questions about our Pokémon team analysis platform.

whatIsThisSite.question: What is this website for?
whatIsThisSite.answer: Pokémon Team Analysis is a comprehensive platform designed to help trainers analyze and optimize their Pokémon teams for competitive play. Our tools provide detailed insights into team composition, type coverage, resistances, and strategic recommendations to enhance your battle performance in VGC and other competitive formats.

howToContact.question: How can we contact you?
howToContact.answer: You can reach us through email at contact{'@'}example.com. We welcome feedback, suggestions, and bug reports to help improve our platform for the Pokémon competitive community.
